snippet: Federal authorities say Andrea Sanderlin, 45, raised thousands of marijuana plants with state-of-the-art equipment in a Queens warehouse.
abstract: Federal authorities accuse Andrea Sanderlin of raising thousands of marijuana plants with state-of-the-art equipment in a Queens warehouse; charges have stunned residents in Sanderlin's fashionable Scarsdale, NY, community, where she was known as mother of two children who had fondness for riding horses.

byline.original: By JENNY ANDERSON and ALAN FEUER

lead_paragraph: Federal authorities say Andrea Sanderlin, 45, raised thousands of marijuana plants with state-of-the-art equipment in a Queens warehouse.

headline.seo: Scarsdale, N.Y., Woman Is Charged as Marijuana Farmer
headline.main: She Rode Horses, Drove an S.U.V. and, the Authorities Say, Farmed Marijuana
headline.print_headline: She Rode Horses, Drove an S.U.V. and, the Authorities Say, Farmed Marijuana
